channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Reeves plays down digital ID U-turn as Tories and Lib Dems criticise PM’s ‘spinelessness’ – UK politics live
item.description: Ministers have rolled back central element of digital ID plans, possibly allowing people to use other forms of identification to prove their right to ...

item.title: Watchdog to criticise West Midlands police over Maccabi Tel Aviv ban
item.description: Policing inspectorate to say force made series of errors in how it gathered and handled intelligence UK politics live – latest updates West Midlands p...

item.title: Iran’s judiciary vows fast trials for arrested protesters despite Trump threats – live
item.description: US president says ‘help is on its way’, as reported death toll rises into the thousands For the first time in days, Iranians were able to make calls a...

item.title: Circumcision kits found on sale on Amazon UK
item.description: Exclusive: Discovery comes amid growing concern over lax regulation and children being put at risk by rogue operators Circumcision kits have been foun...

item.title: Denmark and Greenland prepare for US talks as Trump says territory’s PM has a ‘big problem’ – Europe live
item.description: US president says of Jens-Frederik Nielsen: ‘I don’t know anything about him, but this is going to be a big problem for him’ Meanwhile, Poland’s presi...

item.title: Kneecap terrorism charge appeal case begins at High Court
item.description: The UK government is appealing the September 2025 decision to dismiss the case brought against Liam Óg Ó hAnnaidh, aka Mo Chara.

item.title: UK secures record supply of offshore wind projects
item.description: The government needs to significantly boost its capacity of offshore wind projects if it is to meet its clean power targets.

item.title: LA to open ticket draw for 2028 Olympics - with seats starting at $28
item.description: If chosen via the draw, fans will be notified via email and will be given a time slot to purchase tickets in April.

item.title: Greenlanders brace for summit that could shape the Arctic's future - and their own
item.description: US Vice President JD Vance will host Danish and Greenlandic foreign ministers for talks on Wednesday.

item.title: LA to open ticket draw for 2028 Olympics - with seats starting at $28
item.description: If chosen via the draw, fans will be notified via email and will be given a time slot to purchase tickets in April.
